author: 0x_qz
content: hi, we were using RPC to query the history state data from the official geth node (like 400 blocks before), but it reports that "missing trie node, the state is not available", does anyone know what is wrong? (The issue can be reproduced by "curl -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getBalance","params":["0x8943545177806ED17B9F23F0a21ee5948eCaa776", "0x320C8"],"id":1}' https://rpc.dencun-devnet-11.ethpandaops.io/")

author: parithosh
content: I don't think we're running an archive node for the rpc there. So I'd recommend running your own node as an archive and querying that.
